backend/main.mo: Motoko backend defining booking, provider, rental, and user profile types with map-based state and access‑controlled user profile queries and updates.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report listing implemented branding requirements and related affected files/components.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries describing purposes of various frontend files including pages, components, hooks, and utilities.
frontend/index.css: Global Tailwind base styles and theme variables for light/dark modes.
frontend/index.html: Base HTML file mounting the React app and loading main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: App router configuring all routes and shared layout with header, footer, and toaster.
frontend/src/components/auth/AccessDenie: UI screen showing an access‑denied message with a button to return home.
frontend/src/components/auth/LoginButton: Login/logout button using Internet Identity with status handling and query cache clearing.
frontend/src/components/auth/RequireLogi: Wrapper that forces login before rendering children, showing a login prompt if unauthenticated.
frontend/src/components/bookings/Booking: Badge component mapping booking statuses to labels and style variants.
Renders the uploaded EYEGIC logo image as a link to the home page.
frontend/src/components/forms/OptionalPh: Image upload component with preview and optional removal, calling a callback on change.
frontend/src/components/layout/PageLayou: Page wrapper applying max-width, title, and description before rendering children.
frontend/src/components/layout/SiteFoote: Footer showing branding, navigation links, and a dynamic copyright section.
frontend/src/components/layout/SiteHeade: Responsive header with navigation, login controls, and a mobile slide-out menu.
frontend/src/hooks/bookings/useBooking.t: Fetches a single booking by ID using the actor service.
frontend/src/hooks/bookings/useCreateOpt: Creates an optician booking and invalidates customer booking queries.
frontend/src/hooks/bookings/useCreateRen: Creates a rental booking and refreshes customer bookings on success.
frontend/src/hooks/bookings/useCreateRep: Creates a repair booking via actor and invalidates customer bookings.
frontend/src/hooks/bookings/useCustomerB: Loads all customer bookings from the backend actor.
frontend/src/hooks/bookings/useProviderB: Loads all provider bookings tied to the authenticated provider.
frontend/src/hooks/bookings/useUpdateBoo: Updates a booking’s status and invalidates related booking queries.
Empty placeholder hook for site logo logic.
Fetches provider data for the authenticated user and provides onboarding mutation.
frontend/src/hooks/rentals/useRentalCata: Fetches the rental catalog from the actor service.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages the backend actor instance, refreshing dependent queries on identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Context and hooks for managing Internet Identity authentication and state.
frontend/src/index.css: Configures Tailwind layers and defines extensive light/dark theme CSS variables plus utility components.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with React Query and Internet Identity context providers.
frontend/src/pages/bookings/BookingDetai: Displays detailed information for a specific booking with status, metadata, and navigation.
frontend/src/pages/bookings/mobile-optic: Shows confirmation details for a completed mobile optician booking, including status and totals.
Provides a form for creating a mobile optician booking and handles submission logic.
frontend/src/pages/bookings/MyBookingsPa: Shows the logged‑in user's bookings with summaries, status badges, and navigation to details.
frontend/src/pages/bookings/rentals/Rent: Shows confirmation details for a completed rental booking, fetching booking data and displaying price, address, and actions.
Handles creating a rental booking, including rental duration, address input, price calculation, and submission to backend.
frontend/src/pages/bookings/repairs/Repa: Displays confirmation and details of a submitted repair request, including repair info, address, and estimated price.
Form for submitting a repair request with issue type, details, address, preferred time, optional photo, and price calculation.
frontend/src/pages/HomePage.tsx: Renders the homepage with hero content, service listings, and a how‑it‑works section.
frontend/src/pages/provider/ProviderDash: Provider dashboard showing provider profile and assigned bookings with ability to update booking statuses.
frontend/src/pages/provider/ProviderOnbo: Provider registration form collecting personal info, service areas, and offered services to create a provider profile.
frontend/src/pages/rentals/RentalItemDet: Displays detailed information for a rental item, handles loading and missing-item states, and shows pricing and availability.
frontend/src/pages/rentals/RentalsCatalo: Shows a searchable and filterable list of rental items with category filters and navigation to item details.
frontend/src/pages/services/MobileOptici: Presents the mobile optician service with features, promotional content, and a booking button.
Introduces the eyewear rental service with benefits, visuals, and navigation to the catalog.
Describes available eyewear repair services with visuals and a link to book repair appointments.
frontend/src/pages/settings/BrandingLogo: Empty file with no implemented content.
frontend/src/utils/logoDataUrl.ts: Empty file with no implemented content.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Provides helpers for reading, storing, persisting, and clearing URL parameters and sessionStorage values.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind with plugins, custom color tokens, animations, and extended theme settings for layout and UI components.
project_state.json: Defines project state, emphasizing exclusive use of the user‑provided EYEGIC logo and listing related features and constraints.
